inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: He has documented history of a positive serum anti-HCV antibody test and/or detectable levels of HCV RNA ≥ 50 IU/mL.

inclusion.criterion: Failure to achieve sustained Virologic response (SVR) with previous Interferon based therapy or subjects who refuse Interferon based therapy or are intolerant to Interferon.
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: He failed to achieve SVR with previous Interferon based therapy.

inclusion.criterion: All subjects enrolling in the study and all fertile or potentially fertile sexual partners of subjects must be using two reliable forms of effective contraception during the study unless a study participant/partner is surgically sterile or postmenopausal.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Male or female 18-70 years of age.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Subjects with any history of decompensated liver disease, including but not restricted to portal hypertension as manifested by gastroesophageal varices, variceal bleeding, ascites, or encephalopathy or a hepatic mass lesion suspicious for hepatocellular carcinoma (HCC).
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Liver histology consistent with any other co-existing cause of chronic liver disease (apart from fatty liver).
exclusion.label: unknown
exclusion.evidence: The recent biopsy was negative for hepatocellular carcinoma and was only remarkable for chronic inflammation compatible with a chronic viral hepatitis.

exclusion.criterion: Subjects who have been treated for HCV infection within 6 months before Screening.
exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: He is on IFN, RBV and direct antiviral drugs for the past 6 months.

notes: The patient has chronic hepatitis C infection based on documented history of a positive serum anti-HCV antibody test and/or detectable levels of HCV RNA ≥ 50 IU/mL. He failed to achieve SVR with previous Interferon based therapy.
